name: PUT_post
descriptionHtml:
Request:

PUT - https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/booking/1062

raw 
  {
    "firstname" : "Dimasya",
    "lastname" : "Spirl",
    "totalprice" : 111,
    "depositpaid" : true,
    "bookingdates" : {
        "checkin" : "2022-01-01",
        "checkout" : "2023-02-01"
    },
    "additionalneeds" : "Breakfast"
}

Response:

200 - OK 

  {"firstname":"Dimasya","lastname":"Spirl","totalprice":111,"depositpaid":true,"bookingdates":{"checkin":"2022-01-01","checkout":"2023-02-01"},"additionalneeds":"Breakfast"}
